Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>Ah...<sp:5:0:0> This is the perfect music to relax to
after a long day of work.

Good thing the Stable Trotters are back!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for sending those monsters
packing. <sp:5:0:0>Now I'm right where I wanna
be, back at my horses' side!
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>With the pirates gone, I've got a lot of
work to catch up on.

I wonder when I'll be able to take the
horses for a walk...
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>The horses have been so patient!
They waited this whole time for me
to come back.
After I'm done here, I'll treat them to a
leisurely trot to <clr:0000>South Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat>My thoughts tend to dwell on the god of
horses, not some rumored beast.

But from what I've heard, the rumor is
traveling among the stables. I'll admit I
know nothing at all about this beast.
There's a picture of it hung up at
<clr:0000>South Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>, however, if
you want to see what it looks like.
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Got something else to ask?


If it's the <clr:0000>rumored beast <clr:ffff>you want to
know about, you'd be better off going
to <clr:0000>South Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>.
Talk26: <sp:3:0:2:0701>...Assuming the rain has stopped, that is.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice>Never heard of <clr:0000>South Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
That's all right. I'll tell you about it.
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Then again, I wouldn't want 'em to get
scared by that picture of the <clr:0000>rumored
beast <clr:ffff>hanging there.
Maybe it'd be better to go elsewhere...
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Supposedly<sp:5:0:0> they used to have a <clr:0000>Cucco
there who gave prophecies<clr:ffff>.

Turns out it was just a Yiga Clan member
in disguise! That caused quite the stir.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Supposedly <sp:5:0:0>there's a <clr:0000>Cucco there who
gives prophecies<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

I know, hard to believe. But what it says
usually turns out to be true.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There are a lot of sheep there too, which
I found pretty shocking... <sp:5:0:0>What kind of
stable has sheep?
They also have a <clr:0000>picture of that rumored
beast <clr:ffff>on the wall. It's an odd stable.
Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You planning to check out that <clr:0000>picture
of the rumored beast <clr:ffff>over there at
<clr:0000>South Akkala Stable<clr:ffff>?
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice>You forgot what I told you about it, huh?
That's OK.<sp:5:0:0> I don't mind repeating myself.
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>South Akkala Stable <clr:ffff>is southwest of here,
across the Akkala Highlands.
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Notice>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>The rumors about a <clr:0000>strange beast<clr:ffff>
are really making the rounds. Everyone's
talking about this creature.
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>I wonder when I'll have time to take my
horses for a stroll...
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Phew, I'm beat!<sp:5:1:0> A hard day's work'll do
that to you.
